title: Secrets of Britains castles
itunes:title: Secrets of Britains castles
itunes:subtitle: Marc Morris reveals the fascinating history of Britain’s castles, exploring why they were built, what they were used for, and the challenges of capturing them.
description:
Medieval historian Marc Morris reveals the fascinating history of Britain’s castles, exploring why they were built, what they were used for, and the challenges of defending and attacking them.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
